article: It is evening.An old cock is sitting in a tall tree.A fox comes to the tree and  _  at the cock."Hello.Mr.Cock.I have some  _  news for you."says the fox."Oh?"says the cock."What is it?""All the animals are good friends now.Let's  _  friends.too.Please come  _  and play with me.""Fine!"says the cock."I'm very glad to hear that".Then he looks up."Look! There is something over there.""  _  are you looking at?"asks the fox."Oh,I see some animals over there.They're  _  this way.""Animals?""Yes.Oh,they're dogs.""What? Dogs!"asks the fox."Well...well,I  _  go now.Goodbye.""Wait,Mr.Fox,"says the cock."  _  go.They are only dogs.And dogs are our friends now.""Yes,I know,but  the dogs  don't know that.""I see,I see,"says the cock.He  _  and goes to sleep in the tree.Do you know why? Foxes are afraid of dogs.
